subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Birds,
author: Snowfire Lioness
full_text:
----------MB_8CD886605BEB5A3_2298_5750C_Webmail-d104.sysops.aol.com
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="utf-8"

so far, I think it's 4 different states that did the deed, where i live in =
the woods, i have 30 acres of woods, and a lake in a bog area, and marshes =
on two sides of this house, and all kinds of trees, i live in the woods, we=
 have no mosquitoes, i can walk all over through the woods, and rarely do i=
 get a bite from a bug, that's because there are many birds around here, an=
d the marsh birds are the Red Wing black birds, they rarely leave the marsh=
es, so, i don't see why AG killed them, they don't get into feed either, be=
cause they don't eat seed, they are the bug eaters, they have the bills for=
 bug eating, not the round seed type bills.=C2=A0 Ag said they were "poopin=
g in the farmers feed?"=C2=A0 So, weird since those kind of birds hang out =
in marshes.=C2=A0 It's ironic how, in SD they were given the poison out of =
town, yet, the birds flew back and died in the town parks, kind of a pay ba=
ck to the humans who killed them off, hope the other states don't start tha=
t, because it will cause a mess come this summer.=C2=A0 Mosquitos and bugs =
carry all kinds of things, and some destroy trees, so, there will probably =
be an imbalance in nature now since so many thousands were killed, nests wi=
th no parents to feed the young too will cause them to die off as well, no =
hatchling's this spring. sf 



-----Original Message-----
From: SnowfireL@=
aol.com
To: inside_the_box_rtsc_ghost_box_research@yahoogroups.com; EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sat, Jan 22, 2011 12:07 am
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Birds,=


          =C2=A0                                     With them AG, killin=
g off those birds, haha! now watch them complain come  this summer, when we=
 have a massive bug out break, those are the very kind of  birds that maint=
ain the bugs in=C2=A0lower populations, they eat the flying  bugs!=C2=A0 Gr=
ackles, Red Wings, they eat bugs, they keep the mosquitoes in  check too.=
=C2=A0 We will probably have an imbalance now in those states that  killed =
them off now. sf
 
      
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CD886605BEB5A3_2298_5750C_Webmail-d104.sysops.aol.com

Content-Type: text/html; charset="utf-8"
